name: Scally's World: Numbers & Sums
summary:
Another educational title developed by Topologika Software in the ever so obscure Scally series stating: 
 
  Introduces children to numbers and counting with 17 carefully graded activities 
  National Numeracy Strategy-based software 
  Designed for 3-7 year olds 
  Foundation & Key Stages 1, Scotland to P3 
  Clearly spoken number names help children recite numbers along with the program 
  Stunning graphics and real speech motivate children 
  Also suitable for special educational needs
